card.name: Accelerated Mutation
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

card.name: Ageless Sentinels
card.text: Defender Flying When Ageless Sentinels blocks, it becomes a Bird Giant, and it loses defender.

card.name: Alpha Status
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares a creature type with it.

card.name: Ambush Commander
card.text: Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands. {1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Ancient Ooze
card.text: Ancient Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to the total converted mana cost of other creatures you control.

card.name: Aphetto Runecaster
card.text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ark of Blight
card.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Ark of Blight: Destroy target land.

card.name: Astral Steel
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Storm

card.name: Aven Farseer
card.text: Flying Whenever a permanent is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Farseer.

card.name: Aven Liberator
Bladewing the Risen
card.text: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Bladewing's Thrall
card.text: Bladewing's Thrall has flying as long as you control a Dragon. When a Dragon enters the battlefield, you may return Bladewing's Thrall from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bonethorn Valesk
card.text: Whenever a permanent is turned face up, Bonethorn Valesk deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Brain Freeze
card.text: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Storm

card.name: Break Asunder
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cycling {2}

card.name: Cabal Conditioning
card.text: Any number of target players each discard a number of cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

card.name: Cabal Interrogator
card.text: {X}{B}, {T}: Target player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Call to the Grave
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature. At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

card.name: Carbonize
card.text: Carbonize deals 3 damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Carrion Feeder
card.text: Carrion Feeder can't block. Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
card.text: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2}

card.name: Chill Haunting
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Chill Haunting, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Claws of Wirewood
card.text: Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Cycling {2}

card.name: Clutch of Undeath
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 as long as it's a Zombie. Otherwise, it gets -3/-3.

card.name: Coast Watcher
card.text: Flying, protection from green

card.name: Consumptive Goo
card.text: {2}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on Consumptive Goo.

card.name: Daru Spiritualist
card.text: Whenever a Cleric creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Daru Warchief
card.text: Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Soldier creatures you control get +1/+2.

card.name: Dawn Elemental
card.text: Flying Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Dawn Elemental.

card.name: Day of the Dragons
card.text: When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then put that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Death's-Head Buzzard
card.text: Flying When Death's-Head Buzzard dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Decree of Annihilation
Decree of Justice
Decree of Pain
Decree of Savagery
Decree of Silence
Dimensional Breach
card.text: Exile all permanents. For as long as any of those cards remain exiled, at the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns one of the exiled cards he or she owns to the battlefield.

card.name: Dispersal Shield
card.text: Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

card.name: Divergent Growth
card.text: Until end of turn, lands you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Dragon Breath
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Fangs
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Fangs from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Mage
card.text: Flying Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.

card.name: Dragon Scales
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Scales from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Shadow
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has fear. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Shadow from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Tyrant
card.text: Flying, trample Double strike At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dragon Tyrant unless you pay {R}{R}{R}{R}. {R}: Dragon Tyrant gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dragon Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Cycling {1}{U} When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Wings from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
card.text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Dragonstalker
card.text: Flying, protection from Dragons

card.name: Dragonstorm
card.text: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Storm

card.name: Edgewalker
card.text: Cleric spells you cast cost {W}{B} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

card.name: Elvish Aberration
card.text: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Forestcycling {2}

card.name: Enrage
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Eternal Dragon
Exiled Doomsayer
card.text: All morph costs cost {2} more.

card.name: Extra Arms
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Faces of the Past
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, tap all untapped creatures that share a creature type with it or untap all tapped creatures that share a creature type with it.

card.name: Fatal Mutation
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is turned face up, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Final Punishment
card.text: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to him or her this turn.

card.name: Force Bubble
card.text: If damage would be dealt to you, put that many depletion counters on Force Bubble instead. When there are four or more depletion counters on Force Bubble, sacrifice it. At the beginning of each end step, remove all depletion counters from Force Bubble.

card.name: Forgotten Ancient
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

card.name: Form of the Dragon
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of each end step, your life total becomes 5. Creatures without flying can't attack you.

card.name: Frontline Strategist
card.text: Morph {W} When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldier creatures would deal this turn.

card.name: Frozen Solid
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

card.name: Gilded Light
card.text: You gain shroud until end of turn. Cycling {2}

card.name: Goblin Brigand
card.text: Goblin Brigand attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Goblin Psychopath
card.text: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.

card.name: Goblin War Strike
card.text: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.

card.name: Goblin Warchief
card.text: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblin creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Grip of Chaos
card.text: Whenever a spell or ability is put onto the stack, if it has a single target, reselect its target at random.

card.name: Guilty Conscience
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, Guilty Conscience deals that much damage to that creature.

card.name: Hindering Touch
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Storm

card.name: Hunting Pack
card.text: Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. Storm

card.name: Karona, False God
card.text: Haste At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps Karona, False God and gains control of it. Whenever Karona attacks, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Karona's Zealot
card.text: Morph {3}{W}{W} When Karona's Zealot is turned face up, all damage that would be dealt to it this turn is dealt to target creature instead.

card.name: Krosan Drover
card.text: Creature spells you cast with converted mana cost 6 or greater cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Krosan Warchief
card.text: Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.

card.name: Kurgadon
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 6 or greater, put three +1/+1 counters on Kurgadon.

card.name: Lethal Vapors
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, destroy it. {0}: Destroy Lethal Vapors. You skip your next turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Lingering Death
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature.

card.name: Long-Term Plans
card.text: Search your library for a card, shuffle your library, then put that card third from the top.

card.name: Mercurial Kite
card.text: Flying Whenever Mercurial Kite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Metamorphose
card.text: Put target permanent an opponent controls on top of its owner's library. That opponent may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Mind's Desire
card.text: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm

card.name: Mischievous Quanar
Misguided Rage
card.text: Target player sacrifices a permanent.

card.name: Mistform Warchief
card.text: Creature spells you cast that share a creature type with Mistform Warchief cost {1} less to cast. {T}: Mistform Warchief becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Nefashu
card.text: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Noble Templar
card.text: Vigilance Plainscycling {2}

card.name: One with Nature
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Parallel Thoughts
card.text: When Parallel Thoughts enters the battlefield, search your library for seven cards, exile them in a face-down pile, and shuffle that pile. Then shuffle your library. If you would draw a card, you may instead put the top card of the pile you exiled into your hand.

card.name: Pemmin's Aura
card.text: Enchant creature {U}: Untap enchanted creature. {U}: Enchanted creature gains flying until end of turn. {U}: Enchanted creature gains shroud until end of turn. {1}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Primitive Etchings
card.text: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a creature card this way, draw a card.

card.name: Proteus Machine
card.text: Morph {0} When Proteus Machine is turned face up, it becomes the creature type of your choice.

card.name: Putrid Raptor
card.text: Morph - Discard a Zombie card.

card.name: Pyrostatic Pillar
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Pyrostatic Pillar deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Rain of Blades
card.text: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

card.name: Raven Guild Initiate
card.text: Morph - Return a Bird you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Raven Guild Master
card.text: Whenever Raven Guild Master deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top ten cards of his or her library. Morph {2}{U}{U}

card.name: Reaping the Graves
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Storm

card.name: Recuperate
card.text: Choose one - You gain 6 life; or prevent the next 6 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Reward the Faithful
card.text: Any number of target players each gain life equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

card.name: Riptide Survivor
card.text: Morph {1}{U}{U} When Riptide Survivor is turned face up, discard two cards, then draw three cards.

card.name: Rock Jockey
card.text: You can't cast Rock Jockey if you've played a land this turn. You can't play lands if you've cast Rock Jockey this turn.

card.name: Root Elemental
card.text: Morph {5}{G}{G} When Root Elemental is turned face up, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Rush of Knowledge
card.text: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

card.name: Scattershot
card.text: Scattershot deals 1 damage to target creature. Storm

card.text: Morph {U}

card.name: Shoreline Ranger
card.text: Flying Islandcycling {2}

card.name: Siege-Gang Commander
card.text: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Silver Knight
card.text: First strike, protection from red

card.name: Skirk Volcanist
card.text: Morph - Sacrifice two Mountains. When Skirk Volcanist is turned face up, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

card.name: Skulltap
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Skulltap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

card.text: {3}: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. {3}: Gain control of target Sliver.

card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Storm

card.name: Stifle
card.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability.

card.name: Sulfuric Vortex
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

card.name: Temple of the False God
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Temporal Fissure
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Storm

card.text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Storm

card.name: Torrent of Fire
card.text: Torrent of Fire deals damage equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control to target creature or player.

card.name: Trap Digger
card.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Put a trap counter on target land you control. Sacrifice a land with a trap counter on it: Trap Digger deals 3 damage to target attacking creature without flying.

card.name: Treetop Scout
card.text: Treetop Scout can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2}

card.text: Target player discards two cards. Cycling {2}

card.text: Enchant nonbasic land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

card.text: Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.

card.name: Unspeakable Symbol
card.text: Pay 3 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Upwelling
card.text: Mana pools don't empty as steps and phases end.

card.text: Whenever Vengeful Dead or another Zombie dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.text: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Woodcloaker
card.text: Morph {2}{G}{G} When Woodcloaker is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Xantid Swarm
card.text: Flying Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't cast spells this turn.

card.name: Zealous Inquisitor
card.text: {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.
